::DrillBit::

DrillBit followed KitKat into the cavern, and saw the wolf bot.
He replaced his right hand with his gattaling gun, and aimed it at the
wolf.
"What the hell is that?" He says to KitKat.

::Hot Rod::

Hot Rod continues to fire on any Predicon at the Arc.
